topics.body:
"http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2014/04/22/vice-simon-ostrovsky-held-ukraine_n_5192590.html?ncid=edlinkushpmg00000008":http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2014/04/22/vice-simon-ostrovsky-held-ukraine_n_5192590.html?ncid=edlinkushpmg00000008

Simon Ostrovsky - a reporter for VICE news - was arrested in Eastern Ukraine while doing is continuing dispatch of the current affairs in the region.  He's been at it for over a couple months since the Crimean dispute. I guess he's been detained - with others - for prodding about what happened to the original mayor of Slovensk.

He was already half-arrested by the Bakrut in an earlier dispatch, but managed to get out before the diplomatic measures had to be taken and was able to continue his dispatch series. The man's got balls of steel.
